qa.name: Sherlock Paws
qa.essence: Intelligent and witty talking dog detective
qa.appearance: Golden Retriever with a deerstalker hat
qa.clothing: Deerstalker hat and a small magnifying glass on a collar

json_to_edit.voice_over: In a city where mysteries lurk around every corner, one unlikely hero rises to the challenge.
json_to_edit.description: Sherlock Paws, the talking dog detective, investigates a series of puzzling events in the city.
json_to_edit.lighting: Varied, from bright daylight to moody evening scenes
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: City noises, distant sirens, occasional barks
json_to_edit.name: Paw and Order
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Sherlock Paws uses his unique abilities to solve the city's mysteries.

qa.action: A panoramic view of the city skyline, focusing on its bustling streets.

hf.action: Sherlock Paws walking confidently down a busy sidewalk, his deerstalker hat slightly askew.

tr.action: Sherlock's nose twitches as he picks up a scent, his eyes narrowing in concentration.

xc.action: A crowd gathers around Sherlock as he stands on his hind legs, gesturing with his paws while explaining a clue.

ka.action: Camera follows Sherlock as he runs through an alley, hot on the trail of a suspect.

fn.action: View of a computer screen from behind Sherlock as he uses his paws to type out his findings.

af.action: Sherlock stands triumphantly atop a stack of books, having solved a particularly difficult case.

qo.action: The mayor of the city presents Sherlock with a giant bone-shaped key to the city.

fp.action: As night falls, Sherlock's silhouette is seen against the moon, ready for his next adventure.

edit_command: Add two shots at the end and remove the first shot. Don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will update the json according to the edit command. we'll remove the first shot (qa), which is the establishing shot, and add two new shots at the end. we'll maintain the creative and professional tone while adding these new shots, ensuring they fit well with the existing scene. we'll also update the list_display_order and number_of_shots accordingly.
